articles.headline: Tencent, the Chinese Internet Giant, Stumbles. Beijing Gets the Blame
articles.snippet: Bureaucratic reshuffling made it difficult for the company, an emblem of Chinese innovation, to get approvals to make money off new games, hurting earnings.
articles.abstract: Bureaucratic reshuffling made it difficult for the company, an emblem of Chinese innovation, to get approvals to make money off new games, hurting earnings.
articles.lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — Its chat app has inspired Silicon Valley. It owns some of the biggest video game franchises in the world. And after years of growth it has become one of the largest internet companies in the world.

articles.headline: Trump Revokes Ex-C.I.A. Director John Brennan’s Security Clearance
articles.snippet: The White House cited “erratic” behavior by Mr. Brennan, who has frequently been a fierce critic of the president.
articles.abstract: The White House cited “erratic” behavior by Mr. Brennan, who has frequently been a fierce critic of the president.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump revoked the security clearance of John O. Brennan, the former C.I.A. director under President Barack Obama, on Wednesday in a striking act of retaliation against an outspoken critic. The president threatened to do the same to other former national security officials who have antagonized him.
articles.byline: By Julie Hirschfeld Davis and Michael D. Shear

articles.headline: A Question for Tesla’s Board: What Was Elon Musk’s Mental State?
articles.snippet: The same traits that have made Mr. Musk a great entrepreneur also make him a potentially troublesome chief executive. Tesla’s board should act as a filter.
articles.abstract: The same traits that have made Mr. Musk a great entrepreneur also make him a potentially troublesome chief executive. Tesla’s board should act as a filter.
articles.lead_paragraph: There’s no question that Elon Musk is one of the great entrepreneurs of this era. He may even be in “a class of one,” as he recently described Tesla, the revolutionary electric car company he founded.

articles.headline: ‘It’s Really Hard to Be a Catholic’: The Pain of Reading the Sex Abuse Report
articles.snippet: Catholics around the country said they felt frustrated with the church’s leadership.
articles.abstract: Catholics around the country said they felt frustrated with the church’s leadership.
articles.lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH — John Cabon stood quietly and crossed himself before a statue of the Virgin Mary outside St. Paul’s, the mother church of the Pittsburgh Diocese.
articles.byline: By Campbell Robertson and Sharon Otterman

articles.headline: Pelosi, Under Threat in Her Own Party, Says She Is Building Bridge to New Leaders
articles.snippet: Nancy Pelosi, the House Democratic leader, is confronting threats from different corners of her party, and attacks from Republicans, in a test of her grip on her caucus.
articles.abstract: Nancy Pelosi, the House Democratic leader, is confronting threats from different corners of her party, and attacks from Republicans, in a test of her grip on her caucus.
articles.lead_paragraph: Nancy Pelosi is girding for a mortal challenge to her leadership of the Democratic Party after the November elections or even sooner, and in a signal of reassurance to anxious lawmakers says that she is deliberately building a “bridge” to a new generation of party leaders.
articles.byline: By Alexander Burns and Jonathan Martin
